name: Car Crash Test Simulator 3D
description:
Car Crash Test Simulator 3D - a simulator mannequin stikmen driving at the crash test!
Feel like test dummy, during the crash test!
Not everyone can get to the end!
But you will not only observe, but also to try to break the car as much as possible!
Not so simple, you will have to go around various obstacles!
Only the most nimble and fast can beat the car completely!
Test your courage!
Beat friends record, get the highest score!
Defeat the sports car on the blocks!
Details realistically crumple and break!
Thank you for playing our games! Leave us ratings and reviews, and we will make our game more interesting!
